channel.title: Ranging Issue (PVP) [PI]
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
My problem as of now:
Any sort of ranging has a delay on it, and it will not show the damage hit on the player, but it will append the damage when I attack an NPC after I hit the player a couple times. What I get in my debug.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6kXJB.png[/img]
Any help is appreciated thanks!
